Doña Lilian su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su casa de  habitación en el municipio donde vive y lugares cercanos que recorre ofreciendo su producto. Necesita el préstamo para la compra de lociones, cremas, champo, desodorante, etc. productos para surtir su negocio y de esta manera seguir realizando su trabajo, el cual le ayuda mucho ya que las ganancias son de mucha utilidad en el hogar. 
Doña Lilian con el préstamo espera que sus ventas aumenten y así satisfacer la demanda de sus clientes,  gracias a esto espera poder mejorar la calidad de vida de su  familia. 
Doña Lilian espera en un corto plazo hacer crecer su negocio y  con esto poder seguir apoyando a su familia.


Choluteca, Honduras – Octubre del  2013
texts.en:
Lilian is a very hardworking and responsible person. She lives in a community at the south of Honduras with her family. She has sold clothes and cosmetics for five years. 
Lilian's business is located in her home in the city where she lives. She needs a loan to purchase lotions, creams, shampoo, deodorant, etc. in order to stock her business. With these products, she can continue to work which helps a lot since the earnings are very useful for her household. With this loan, Lilian hopes that her sales will increased and satisfy the demand of her customers. Thanks to this, she hopes to improve the quality of life of her family. Lilian hopes to grow her business in a short time and continue to support her family. 

Choluteca, Honduras –  October  2013

loans.use: purchase lotions, creams, shampoo, deodorant, etc. for her business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to increase her current inventory levels, hence allowing her to sell greater quantities of provisions.

loans.name: Bina

texts.en:
Bina is 55 years old. She is married and has two children aged 24 and 22. Many years ago, she established her furniture-making business. Working six days a week and 8 hours a day, she supports her family.  She has already received and successfully repaid six loans from Patan BPW and used her most recent loan to buy wood and timber for her business. In the future, Bina plans to uplift the economic condition of her family. She thanks you for your support. 

In Nepal, furniture is still made the old-fashioned way.  Using little more than basic hand tools, skilled artisans form raw lumber into beautifully finished pieces of furniture.  With precision and an eye for detail, furniture makers produce shelves, bed frames, and cabinet sets. With the help of a Kiva loan, a furniture maker is able to increase the volume of their lumber purchases or hire additional labor. This additional leverage allows an entrepreneur to increase productivity and profitability.

loans.use: to buy wood.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase an increased amount of products used in washing hair

loans.name: Abdel Moneim

texts.en:
Abdel Moneim is a 23-year-old single young man from Qalqilia city. He lives with his family in a simple house. Abdel's mother works as an employee in the public sector and his brother is a worker. Abdel also works to help his family cover part of the monthly expenses. He owns a small store selling accessories. This store has been open for one year. It is a good business and earns a good income, but still needs a lot of improvements. 

Abdel took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy more products to resell in his store. By taking this loan, Abdel will be able to improve his business and his income will increase. 

Abdel appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy more products to resell in his store

loans.name: Francis

texts.en:
Francis is a man of 43 years, married to Sophia and a father of three children. He is in a motorcycle transport business and also sells wool. He has been in this business for three years now and makes a monthly income of 15,000 shillings.

This will be Francis' third loan with Kenya Agency for Development of Enterprise and Technology (KADET) Ltd. He plans to use the entire loan to buy wool for resale. He wants to educate his children and be a prosperous businessman in the future.

loans.use: to buy wool for resale

loans.name: María Elizabeth

texts.es: María, con 57 años de edad, es una madre soltera de 4 hijos por los cuales ha luchado incansablemente. Desde hace 18 años inició su propio negocio, una pequeña fábrica de arepas ubicada en su vivienda, en la que trabaja sola de lunes a domingo de 4:00 am a 4:00 pm, esta actividad la aprendió de manera empírica porque surgió la necesidad de generar ingresos por cuenta propia, ya que nunca contó con el apoyo del padre de sus hijos. Poco a poco fue mejorando su técnica y fue adquiriendo más clientela, lo que le ha permitido permanecer activa durante tantos años. Su perseverancia, empuje, dedicación y entrega le han permitido lograr sus objetivos y su mayor anhelo es poder continuar con su labor hasta que Dios y su cuerpo se lo permitan; es por esta razón que solicita el apoyo de su sexto ciclo de crédito con el que desea realizar adecuaciones locativas, comprar extractores de calor y renovar los equipos de trabajo (molino y ollas), lo que le permitirá tener mejores condiciones para laborar y además agilizará su proceso de producción, para así poder cumplir oportunamente con las entregas de los pedidos, abriendo la posibilidad de adquirir nuevos clientes para mejorar sus ventas e ingresos, con los que María podrá seguir aportando a la economía del hogar y en un futuro tendrá la oportunidad de disfrutar una vejez más tranquila y con mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Maria is 57 years old and the single mother of four children, for whom she has worked tirelessly.  She started her own business 18 years ago, a small arepas factory in her home, where she works alone Monday through Sunday from 4:00 am to 4:00 pm.  She learned this on her own, out of need for generating an income on her own, since she never got support from her children’s father.  Little by little she perfected her techniques and gained more customers, allowing her to remain active all these years.  Her perseverance, drive, and dedication have allowed her to reach her objectives and her greatest desire is to be able to continue working as long as God and her body will allow it.  It’s for this reason that she is asking for her sixth loan so she can make improvements such as buying heat extractors and renovating her work equipment (mill and pots).  This will give her better working conditions and speed up the production process so she can deliver her products.  This will open up the possibility for her to acquire new customers so she can increase her sales and income, so that Maria can continue supporting the household financially, and in the future have a more relaxed and better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy and renovate her equipment.

loans.name: María Olivia

texts.es: María es una mujer pujante y activa de 53 años de edad, a la que la vida le ha puesto grandes desafíos que con tenacidad, empeño y dedicación ha sobrepasado gracias a la motivación de sus dos hijos. Es madre cabeza de hogar desde que se separó de su esposo y, desde entonces ha luchado incansablemente para sacarlos adelante. Hace aproximadamente 20 años inició su propio negocio en sociedad con una amiga, un almacén de variedades en el que ofrece artículos como ropa para dama y caballero, accesorios para celulares, juguetes, productos de aseo personal, entre otros, trabaja todos los días de 8:00 am a 8:00 pm y, de esta manera genera los recursos para su sustento y para apoyar económicamente a sus hijos con el pago de los estudios universitarios. Actualmente solicita su cuarto ciclo crediticio con el que desea comprar mercancía al por mayor (juguetería, ropa, artículos de decoración de navidad, entre otros), de esta manera tendrá la posibilidad de ofrecer más variedad de productos a sus clientes y así mejorar las ventas, especialmente en la temporada de fin de año que se aproxima, permitiendo aumentar el margen de utilidades que recibe por cada venta. Esto le ayudará a María a seguir avanzando para llegar a cumplir su principal sueño de montar otro almacén en un pueblo cercano a su lugar de residencia, para mejorar la rentabilidad y lograr una estabilidad económica que le permita seguir apoyando a sus hijos en sus proyectos y poder disfrutar de una mejor calidad de vida y bienestar.
texts.en:
Maria is a driven and active 53 year old woman who has overcome great challenges with tenacity, effort, dedication, and motivation from her children.  She has been head of household since she separated from her husband, and since then has worked tirelessly to get ahead.  She started her own business about 20 years ago, in partnership with a friend.  It was a variety store where she offers things such as men’s and women’s clothing, cell phone accessories, toys, personal products, and other things.  She works daily from 8:00 am to 8:00 pm and generates income to support her children and pay for their university studies.

She is asking for her fourth loan so she can buy merchandise in quantity (toys, clothing, Christmas decorations, and other things), and in this way be able to offer her customers a greater variety of products and increase her sales, especially during the approaching year’s end.  She will be able to increase her profits with every sale.  This will help Maria to get ahead and meet her main goal of opening another store in a nearby town, in order to increase her profits and have financial stability that will allow her to continue supporting her children and be able to enjoy a better quality of life and wellbeing.

loans.use: to stock her store.

loans.name: Blanca Nora

texts.es: Blanca es una mujer casada y madre de 2 hijos. Hace aproximadamente 20 años se involucró en el campo del comercio, pues su familia pasaba por dificultades económicas debido a la falta de recursos, por lo que decidió comenzar a vender mercancía a crédito, de manera ambulante  y, poco a poco fue adquiriendo más clientela pero su principal desafío era encontrar a los clientes para cobrar las cuotas del pago de los artículos que compraban, por esta razón, desde hace 13 años decidió abrir un almacén en el que ofrece productos como ropa para dama y caballero, juguetería, accesorios, productos de aseo, entre otros, en el que puede atender a sus clientes de una manera cómoda y además tiene la ventaja de poder exhibir los productos que ofrece; de esta manera, ha generado los recursos suficientes para solventar las necesidades básicas del hogar. Su empuje, carisma y dedicación le han permitido sobrepasar diversos obstáculos, que la han llevado hasta donde hoy se encuentra. Actualmente, a sus 49 años de edad, solicita el apoyo de su primer ciclo de crédito con el que desea comprar mercancía al por mayor (Juguetería, artículos de decoración para navidad, ropa, accesorios, entre otros), así tendrá su almacén abastecido para satisfacer las diversas necesidades y gustos de sus compradores, permitiendo así un incremento en las ventas y en las utilidades que obtiene de ellas. De esta forma, Blanca puede contar con la oportunidad de hacer crecer su negocio y le permitirá expandirse hacia otros sectores, lo que para ella significaría haber cumplido su principal sueño, por el momento desea seguir trabajando arduamente para ofrecer a sus hijos un mejor bienestar y disfrutar una mejor calidad de vida al lado de los que ama.
texts.en:
Blanca is a married woman and the mother of 2 children.  She became involved in business about 20 years ago because her family was facing financial difficulties due to lack of resources.  She decided to begin selling merchandise on credit, on foot, and little by little she began gaining more customers.  Her main challenge was to locate customers when it came time to collect, so she decided to open a store 13 years ago, where she offers products such as men’s and women’s clothing, toys, accessories, personal products, and other things.  She can serve customers more comfortably and also has the advantage of being able to exhibit her products.  This has allowed her to generate sufficient income to pay for basic household needs.  Her drive, charisma and dedication have allowed her to surpass various obstacles, and this has brought her to where she is today.

Now, at her 49 years, she is asking for her first loan so she can buy merchandise in quantity (toys, Christmas decorations, accessories, and other things).  This way she will have a stock to satisfy her customers’ different needs and likes, and help increase her sales and the benefits she gets from them.  This way Blanca can have the opportunity to grow her business and expand into other sectors, which will mean achieving her main dream.  In the mean time she will continue working arduously so she can provide her children with better wellbeing and enjoy a better quality of life alongside those she loves.

loans.use: to buy inventory.

loans.name: Nancy Elena

texts.es: Nancy, con 35 años de edad, es una madre soltera de un hijo de 5 años por quien ha luchado incansablemente desde su nacimiento. Durante muchos años trabajó como empleada doméstica en diferentes casas de familia, pero cansada de la extenuante labor y de no poseer posibilidades para mejorar sus ingresos, decidió retirarse y con la liquidación de su último empleo decidió emprender su propio negocio, una venta de tinto, café, aromáticas y jugos de manera ambulante alrededor y dentro de la plaza de mercado del municipio donde reside, actividad que realiza desde hace 10 años y con la que ha logrado obtener una vivienda digna propia y brindar a su hijo el sustento diario. Su espíritu de superación, su estructura mental fuerte y positiva y con sus metas bien definidas se motiva para solicitar el apoyo del crédito con el que desea comprar nuevos termos térmicos para almacenar el producto, artículos desechables al por mayor (vasos, mezcladores, servilletas), pagar el saldo de un crédito que tiene con un agiotista y tener capital de trabajo disponible para surtir cada 15 días (café, aromáticas, frutas, azúcar, entre otros), esto le permitirá mejorar la rentabilidad de su negocio, pues el interés que cobran los agiotistas son bastante altos y al no tener que recurrir a ellos puede mejorar los ingresos para seguir solventando las necesidades de su hogar e invertir más en su negocio para darle continuidad y seguir ofreciendo productos de muy buena calidad a sus clientes. De esta manera Nancy desea continuar realizando su labor y tendrá la oportunidad de seguir avanzando hacia el cumplimiento de su principal sueño que es poder construir otros dos apartamentos para alquilar y así complementar los ingresos con los que podrá dar una educación de excelente calidad a su hijo y disfrutar junto a él una mejor calidad de vida y bienestar.
texts.en:
Nancy is 35years old and the single mother of a five year old son, for whom she has worked tirelessly since his birth.  She worked as a domestic employee at many homes for many years, but she got tired of the extensive labor and the lack of possibility of improving her income, so she decided to retire and used her severance pay to open her own business, selling coffees, aromatics, and wooden games on foot, around and within the market plaza in her town.  She has been doing this for 10 years and it allowed her to buy a home of her own and support her son.

Her spirit of success, strong, positive mental fortitude and well-defined goals have motivated her to request this loan so she can buy new thermoses to store her products, disposable items in quantity (cups, stirrers, napkins), pay off another loan she has from a speculator, and have capital available to restock every two weeks (coffee, aromatics, fruit, sugar, and other things).  This will allow her to improve her business profitability, because speculators charge high interest rates and not having to return to them will allow her the income she needs to continue supporting her household needs and invest more into her business.  She can give it better continuity and continue to offer good quality products to her customers.

Nancy wants to continue working and having the opportunity to advance toward completing her main dream of building some apartments to rent out so she can provide an excellent quality education to her son and enjoy the best quality of life and wellbeing.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Rubén Darío

texts.es: Rubén, a sus 57 años de edad, se dedica al comercio ambulante desde hace muchos años, vendiendo bolsas plásticas de diferentes tamaños y alguna mercancía que le envía un sobrino desde la ciudad, sus principales clientes son los establecimientos de comercio del municipio donde reside, de esta manera genera los recursos económicos suficientes para subsistir. Es un señor activo y trabajador, manifiesta que su edad no le impide seguir luchando para sobrevivir, pues vive sólo porque nunca se casó. Se motiva a solicitar su tercer ciclo de crédito con el que desea comprar mercancía al por mayor (bolsas plásticas de diferentes tamaños) de esta manera tendrá su inventario abastecido para satisfacer la demanda de sus clientes, lo que le ayuda a mejorar los ingresos que recibe por cada venta. Rubén sólo desea poder seguir realizando su labor con empeño y dedicación para que en un futuro cercano tenga la oportunidad de disfrutar una vejez más tranquila y con mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en: Ruben is 57 years old and is a mobile merchant who has been selling different size plastic bags and some items that his nephew sends him from the city for many years.  His main customers are businesses in town and he is able to generate the income he needs to earn a living.  He is an active and hardworking man and says that his age does not impede him.  He lives alone and never married.  He is asking for his third loan so he can buy merchandise in quantity (plastic bags of different sizes) and be able to satisfy his customer demand.  This will help improve the income he gets from each sale.  Ruben only wants to be able to continue his work with enthusiasm and dedication so that he can have a more tranquil future with better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy inventory.

loans.name: Julio Rafael

texts.es: Julio, a sus 33 años de edad, se dedica a trabajar como guarnecedor en su propio taller, allí se encarga de elaborar la parte superior del calzado en cuero y darle la horma a los mismos, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposa y de un sobrino y realiza esta actividad gracias a la experiencia que obtuvo trabajando en diferentes talleres algunos años atrás; de esta forma genera los recursos suficientes para velar por el bienestar de su familia conformada por su esposa y 3 hijos. El cliente es un hombre apasionado por su labor, dinámico y activo, siempre va en busca de nuevas alternativas que le permitan salir adelante, por ello, solicita el apoyo del crédito con el que desea comprar una máquina de coser con doble aguja, lo que le permitirá mejorar los tiempos de producción y agilizar el proceso completo para cumplir de manera oportuna con las entregas de los pedidos; lo que se reflejará en el incremento de sus ventas y los ingresos que recibe de ellas. Julio quiere seguir trabajando para tener un taller más amplio que le permita ofrecer nuevas oportunidades de empleo y generar mejor rentabilidad, además quiere ofrecer una excelente educación a sus hijos y mejor calidad de vida a toda la familia.
texts.en: Julio is 33 years old and works in his own shoe shop, where he makes the top part of shoes out of leather and puts the finishing touches on them.  He has his wife’s and nephew’s encouragement and is able to do this work, thanks to the experience he gained through different workshops a few years ago.  He generates enough income to provide for his family’s wellbeing, which includes his wife and three children.  He is very dynamic, active, and passionate about his work and always in search of new alternatives that will allow him to get ahead, so he is asking for a loan to buy a double stitch sewing machine.  This will allow him to improve his production times and speed things up so he can better fill his orders, which will be reflected in increased sales and income.  Julio wants to continue working to be able to have a larger workshop so he can offer new job opportunities and obtain better profits.  He also wants to provide his children with an excellent education and a better quality of life for the whole family.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase flour, sugar and oil for her business.

loans.name: Kadiatu

texts.en:
Meet Kadiatu, she is 45 years old and is from Jui eastern area in Freetown. She is married with two children. For the past 25 years, Kadiatu has been running her general stock business. She began her business because she wants to sustain her family's standard of living. She works at the business from 8:00am until 7:00pm, 7 days per week. She says that the main challenge to her business is insufficient capital to expand her business.

Kadiatu requires a loan in order to purchase variety of items such as tooth paste, cream and soap, drinks and to expand her business. She hopes that the extra income from this loan will allow her to become successful and increase her business. In the future, Kadiatu plans to build a house. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of items such as tooth paste, cream and soap to expand her business.

loans.name: Angela Luz

texts.es:
Doña Ángela tiene una edad de 50 años ella es madre soltera (viuda) de 3 hijos la cual tiene un grado de educación de primaria cursado hasta el quinto grado ya que a muy temprana edad ella se casó teniendo una edad de 16 años y posteriormente llegaron sus hijos. Lamentablemente su esposo falleció hace 5 años ya que él padecía de una ulcera que no la pudo controlar desde allí a ella le ha tocado cuidar de sus cultivos de café y seguir luchando para cuidar por el bienestar de sus hijos. El primero tiene 31 años de edad y ya está casado y tiene sus propias cosechas el solo curso hasta quinto grado ya que él es el único varón de la familia y cuando el papa presentaba los problemas de salud a él le tocaba cuidar la finca, y se descuidaba en sus estudios. La segunda tiene 25 años y solo llego a hasta sexto grado ya que no le gusto el estudio, y al paso del tiempo se casó, ella viven con su esposo en la casa de su madre ya que el esposo trabaja fuera de la comunidad. La última hija tiene 21 años ella es profesional y se graduó de maestra de educación primaria la cual ejerce su profesión en una institución donde asisten personas de muy bajos recursos y para el tiempo de cosecha se involucra en la corta del grano. Los cultivos de café de doña Ángela se encuentran ubicados a 200 metros de distancia de su casa de habitación. La Única Dificultad que ella puede presentar es que el intermediario no le lo compre aun precio justo el grano ya que la competencia no es problema.
Doña Ángela tiene como meta seguir cultivando más plantas de café, para obtener mejores ingresos económicos y comprar más tierras para dejarles a sus hijos como herencia y puedan seguir adelante y como su único deseo es que la última hija pueda seguir sus estudios en la Universidad.
Por lo que hoy día ha solicitado financiamiento a la cooperativa COMIXMUL para la compra de insumos agrícolas para poder asistir sus cultivos de café y obtener una excelente cosecha en esta temporada.
texts.en:
Ángela is 50 years old and is a widowed single mother of three children. She has a primary level of education and completed up to fifth grade, since she married at a very young age, when she was 16, and later had children. 

Unfortunately, her husband died five years ago, because he was suffering from an ulcer which could not be controlled. Since then, she has had to take care of the coffee crop and continue struggling to take care of the well-being of her children. 

The oldest is 31 years old, already married, and has his own crops. He only studied to fifth grade because he was the only man in the family, and when his father developed health problems, it was up to him to take care of the farm, so he neglected his studies.

The second is 25 years old and only studied until sixth grade because she didn't like school. Over time, she got married. She lives with her husband in her mother's house, since her husband works outside of the community.

The last daughter is 21 years old and is a professional. She graduated as a primary school teacher, and practices her profession in an institution attended by people in poverty. During harvest time, she is involved in cutting the beans.

Ángela's coffee crop is located 200 meters from the home she lives in. The only problem she has is that the broker will not buy the beans at a fair price, since competition is not a problem.

Ángela's goal is to continue growing more coffee plants to earn a better income, and to buy more land to leave to her children as an inheritance so they can get ahead. Her only wish is that her youngest daughter can continue her university studies.

Because of this, today she has asked for financing from the COMIXMUL cooperative to buy agricultural inputs to care for her coffee crop and get an excellent crop this season.

loans.use: to buy agricultural inputs to care for her coffee crop.

loans.name: Zoraida Yisel

texts.es: Zoraida, a sus 32 años de edad, es madre soltera de dos hijos. Desde hace 14 años se dedica a trabajar en su propio negocio, prestando el servicio de manicure y pedicure a domicilio según las necesidades de sus clientes. La actividad la aprendió por medio de la práctica, pues desde muy joven le organizaba las uñas a sus familiares y, poco a poco fue mejorando su técnica y decidió emprender con esta labor para solventar las necesidades de su hogar y velar por el bienestar de sus dos pequeños hijos. Su empuje, tenacidad y su espíritu de superación, le han permitido sobrepasar diversos obstáculos que se le presentan, como cuando fue víctima de un robo en el que se le llevaron todos los implementos y equipos de trabajo, sin embargo ha sabido llevar la situación y con mucho esfuerzo ha ido surgiendo nuevamente. Esto la motiva a solicitar el apoyo del crédito con el que desea comprar equipos de trabajo (máquina de masajes para pies y manos), implementos e insumos al por mayor (limas, pulidores, esmaltes, tratamientos para masajes, entre otros), esto le permitirá reactivar bien su negocio y podrá seguir prestando un servicio con excelente calidad, que satisfaga los requerimientos de su clientela, en especial en la temporada de fin de año que se aumenta la solicitud de sus servicios. De esta forma Zoraida desea continuar luchando para que su actividad sea una fuente de ingresos rentable y solvente que le permita adquirir su casa propia en la que pueda adecuar su propia sala de belleza para estar más tiempo con sus hijos, al mismo tiempo que genera los ingresos para brindarles una buena educación y mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Zoraida is 32 years old and the single mother of two children.  He has had her own business, providing manicures and pedicures at home, according to her customers’ needs, for 14 years.  She learned this through practice and began doing her family’s nails when she was very young.  She improved her techniques little by little and decided to start a business to pay for the household needs and provide for her children’s wellbeing.  Her drive, tenacity, and spirit of success, have allowed her to overcome the obstacles that she faces, such as when she was robbed and all her work equipment was stolen.  However, she knew how to handle the situation and has resurged once more.

She is asking for a loan to buy work equipment (foot and hand massager), tools, and supplies in quantity (emery boards, buffers, nail polish, massage treatments, and other things).  This will allow her to reactivate her business and continue to provide excellent quality service that satisfies her customer needs, especially over the end of year season, when demand for service increases.  In this way Zoraida can continue working so that she can continue generating income so she can buy a house where she can set up her own beauty salon and be near her children.  She will also generate income so she can provide them with a good education and better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Sandra Milena

texts.es: Sandra, con tan sólo 23 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene un hijo de 18 meses y actualmente está en gestación de su segundo hijo. Desde el año 2009 cuando se trasladó de su ciudad natal, un familiar le obsequió una pequeña chaza en la que vende café, aromáticas, mecato, cigarrillos, dulces, entre otros productos, con el fin de que se generara los ingresos suficientes para subsistir y velar por el bienestar de su abuela y sus bebés, quienes dependen económicamente de ella. Su fortaleza, empuje, perseverancia y el empeño con el que realiza las cosas, le han permitido salir adelante, por ello se motiva para solicitar el apoyo del crédito con el que desea comprar nuevos envases térmicos para almacenar los productos, mecato, cigarrillos y dulcería al por mayor, con lo que podrá aumentar la variedad de productos y así satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes, dando como resultado un incremento favorable en las ventas y en los ingresos que percibe, con los que podrá continuar llevando las riendas de su hogar. Sandra desea seguir trabajando fuertemente para fortalecer su actividad generadora de recursos y así poder brindar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida y bienestar.
texts.en:
Sandra is only 23 years old and the single mother of an 18 year old son.  She is expecting a second child.  In 2009, when she left her native city, a relative gave her a small stall where she cells coffee, aromatics, cigarettes, candy, and other products to generate enough income to support and look after her grandmother’s and babies’ wellbeing.  Her strength, drive, perseverance, and dedication with which she does things have allowed her to get ahead.

She is asking for this loan so she can buy new thermoses to store her products, mecato, cigarettes, and candies in quantity, so she can increase her variety of products, satisfy her customers’ needs, and increase her sales and income so she can continue supporting her household.  Sandra wants to keep working hard to strengthen her source of income and be able to provide a better quality of life and wellbeing to her family.

loans.use: to buy new thermoses and supplies.

loans.name: Fatmata

texts.en:
Meet 28-year-old Fatmata from Jui eastern area in Freetown. She is married with two children. For the past 13 years, Fatmata has managed her medical drugs business. She began her business because she wants to empower herself. She works at the business from 8:00am until 7:00pm, 7 days per week. She is very hard-working and desires to improve her standard of living

Fatmata requires a loan in order to purchase medical drugs such as blood syrup, malarial drugs and pain tablets to expand her business. She hopes that the extra income from this loan will allow her to start a savings account and increase her business. In the future, Fatmata plans to open a big pharmacy within the community. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to purchase medical drugs such as blood syrup, malarial drugs and pain tablets to expand her business.

loans.name: Rina

texts.en:
Rina is 26 years old. She is married and has one child, age 6. Many years ago, she established her brass religious statue making business. Working six days a week and eight hours a day, she supports her family. She has already received and successfully repaid six loans from Patan Business and Professional Women and used her most recent loan to buy raw materials for her business. In the future, Rina plans to uplift the economic condition of her family. She thanks you for your support.

Nepal has a long and rich history of traditional handicrafts. Throughout the Kathmandu Valley, skilled artisans produce unique pieces of art that reflect Nepal's cultural diversity. Terra cotta pottery comes from the red clay of the surrounding Himalayan foothills. Bronze and silver statuettes are formed using wax molds and intricate hand tool finishing. In Patan, Newari culture and traditions are reflected in the images and symbols etched into metal or formed in stone. With the help of a Kiva loan, Nepal's artisans are able to purchase raw materials in greater volume. This increase in volume allows a single artisan to work on several pieces at the same time while increasing her profit margin.

loans.use: to buy raw materials for her brass religious statue making business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy an awning, two tables, and wholesale supplies (fizzy drinks, cheese sticks, and dough for doughnuts, among other things), and to make alterations to his workspace (painting).

loans.name: Ramona

texts.es:
Ramona es estudiante de enfermería, tiene 2 hijos, y comenta que actualmente está  trabajando como moza, y su meta es terminar sus estudios para luego de  llegar a ejercerla.
Su sueño es poder trabajar y dar a sus hijos todo lo que ella no pudo tener y de esa forma salir adelante y crecer.
Pide este préstamo para pagar las clases y sus cuotas y de esa forma poder seguir luchando por cumplir sus metas.
texts.en:
Ramona is a nursing student and has two children.  She says that she is currently working as a maid and her goal is to finish her studies so that she can later work in her field.

Her dream is to be able to work and provide her children with everything she was not able to have, get ahead, and grow.

She is asking for a loan to pay for classes and fees so she can continue working toward her goals.

loans.use: to pay tuition.

loans.name: Amina

texts.en:
Meet Amina; she is a 38-year-old from Jui Eastern Area in Freetown. She is married with two children. For the past 10 years, Amina has established her retail business. She began her business because she wanted to generate a permanent source of income. She works at the business from 8:00 a.m. until 7:00 p.m., seven days per week. She says that her business is doing well because her little business enables her to take care of her family.

Amina requires a loan in order to purchase different kinds of items such as palm oil, charcoal and cooking seasonings to expand her business. She hopes that the extra income from this loan will allow her to change her standard of living and increase her business. In the future, Amina plans to open a big clothing shop. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to purchase different kinds of items such as palm oil, charcoal and cooking seasonings to expand her business

loans.name: Nueva Esperanza Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamada Nueva Esperanza está en su segundo ciclo, es de la Ciudad de Concepción, la cual es una zona un poco alejada de la zona céntrica y aún se encuentra en crecimiento. Es una zona de difícil acceso, por lo que las integrantes de este grupo quieren luchar por ir creciendo y dar a la zona donde viven un mejor ambiente y que vayan creciendo lentamente.
La Sra.  Myrian es vendedora de comidas, las cuales sale a vender de forma ambulante, y por medio de su trabajo ayuda a su familia a tener los ingresos que necesitan para una vida sin privaciones.
Ella pide de este crédito para poder invertirlo en la compra de insumos para poder hacer sus comidas, como ser verduras, condimentos, harina, huevos, y demás, para poder seguir deleitando a sus clientes con las delicias que hace. Además quiere poder ayudar a su comunidad para seguir creciendo.
texts.en:
The group called "Nueva Esperanza" (New Hope) is in its second loan cycle. These members are from the city of Concepción, which is a slightly remote area outside of the central district. This area is also growing, but it is difficult to access. For this reason, the members of this group want to grow so that they can transform the area where they live into a better environment. They would like to see the community gradually grow as well.

Sra. Myrian is a food vendor who travels in order to make her sales. Through her work, she is able to help her family by providing the income they need so that they can have a life without feeling deprived. Myrian is requesting a loan so that she can invest in the purchase of supplies for preparing her dishes, such as vegetables, condiments, flour, eggs, and other items. This will enable her to continue satisfying her customers with the delicious food she prepares. In addition, she will be able to help her community keep growing.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, condiments, flour, eggs, and other items for preparing her dishes.

loans.name: Halima

texts.ru: Халима добрая женщина. Она является мастером своего дела.  Халима опытная портниха и создает шедевры таджикских национальных платьев. Ей 30  лет. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 2 детей. Ее дети несовершеннолетние. С целью обеспечения семьи со всеми необходимыми средствами 3 года назад она начала свой бизнес. Она предоставляет свои услуги дома. Благодаря  хорошему сервису, она обладает широким кругом клиентов. Она является основным кормильцем семьи, так как ее муж не имеет постоянное место работы. Он собирается уехать в Российскую Федерацию и найти там место работы. Халима должна купить авиабилет для своего мужа, но не имеет денег. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 1000 сомон для покупки авиабилета. Она надеется на вас и вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Halima is a kind woman and a master in her field.  She is an experienced dressmaker and creates masterpieces of traditional Tajik dresses.  She is 30 years old, married, and is raising two children, both of whom are minors.  With an aim to providing her family with all the necessities, she started her own business three years ago.  Hers is a home-based business.  As a result of her good service, she has a wide client base.

Halima is her family's main breadwinner since her husband doesn't have a steady job.   He is now preparing to move to Russia to find a job.  Halima must buy his airline ticket, but she doesn't have enough money.  She is requesting a loan of 1,000 somoni (TJS) to buy the airline ticket.  She is relying on you and your kindness.

loans.use: to buy an airline ticket for her husband

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy pants, shirts, skirts, dresses, blouses, etc. for his business.

loans.name: Ramita

texts.en:
Ramita is 34 years old. She is married and has one child, age 12. Many years ago, she established her brass religious statue making business. Working six days a week and eight hours a day, she supports her family. She has already received and successfully repaid four loans from Patan Business and Professional Women and used her most recent loan to buy raw materials for her business. In the future, Ramita plans to uplift the economic condition of her family. She thanks you for your support.

Nepal has a long and rich history of traditional handicrafts. Throughout the Kathmandu Valley, skilled artisans produce unique pieces of art that reflect Nepal's cultural diversity. Terra cotta pottery comes from the red clay of the surrounding Himalayan foothills. Bronze and silver statuettes are formed using wax molds and intricate hand tool finishing. In Patan, Newari culture and traditions are reflected in the images and symbols etched into metal or formed in stone. With the help of a Kiva loan, Nepal's artisans are able to purchase raw materials in greater volume. This increase in volume allows a single artisan to work on several pieces at the same time while increasing her profit margin.

loans.use: to buy raw materials for her brass religious statue making business

loans.name: Mariano

texts.es: Mariano agradece a los inversionistas que le hayan apoyado con el crédito y se siente contento por el apoyo brindado y desea continuar participando en el proyecto, él continua con la venta de productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azúcar, fideos y también con la venta de verduras y frutas. Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo, él sigue siendo un hombre emprendedor y trabajador  que saca adelante a su familia pues él  continua siendo parte  del banco comunal “Paititi”, él en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar comestibles como por ejemplo arroz, azúcar, fideos, aceite y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales.
texts.en: Mariano says that he is grateful for the support extended to him by lenders.  He is glad of the support and hopes to continue making the most of this project.  He still operates a corner grocery, selling fruits and vegetables, as well as everyday products such as rice, sugar and pasta.  He has operated the business for several years and it is successful thanks to his hard work.  He has long been an enterprising, hard-working man who has pulled his family ahead thanks in part to the support of the Paititi community bank.  Mariano will use this loan to stock his business with products such as rice, sugar, pasta and cooking oil and he is committed to repaying the loan in the agreed-upon time.

loans.use: to stock his corner grocery.

loans.name: Ful Maya

texts.en:
Ful Maya is 40 years old. She is married and has two children aged 16 and 14. Many years ago, she established her tea shop business. Working six days a week and eight hours a day, she supports her family. 

She has already received and successfully repaid four loans from Patan BPW and used her most recent loan to buy food materials for her business. In the future, Ful Maya plans to improve the economic condition of her family. She thanks you for your support.

Whether on the streets of Kathmandu or in the villages outside of the capital, tea shops are places of business and meeting in Nepal. Called a chiya pasal, these tea shops make a sweet, milky tea that can be purchased for a few cents a cup. With a Kiva loan, BPW's borrowers are able to keep their store shelves stocked while increasing their profit margins by buying in greater volume.

loans.use: to buy food materials

loans.name: Yanira Cecilia

texts.es:
Yanira de 41 años de edad, gracias al esfuerzo  de sus padres le pudieron dar el estudio y la perseverancia de ella pudo estudiar hasta la universidad y lograr cursar una licenciatura, los que viven con ella son sus padres, ya son de avanzada edad y se quedo con ellos para apoyarlos en todo lo posible.

Yanira desde muy joven, se ha dedicado al trabajo ayudandole a su padre en todo lo necesario, en lo que respecta la agricultura, cuando estaba estudiando trabajaba en una tienda para  mantener sus estudios; ya que tenia que colaborar con sus padres. Luego de terminar sus estudios, trabajo en un hospital y una escuela, luego dejo de laborar ya que solo lo hacia por temporada y se dedico a ayudarle exclusivamente a su padre y madre, esta muy pendiente de ellos y les colabora en lo necesario, cuidando los animales (bovinos) de sus padres.


Los fondos del crédito serán destinados en la compra unos bueyes (2), ya que su padre necesita para sacar la cosecha de maíz. Ella manifiesta que sus aspiraciones a futuro, es superarse personalmente y laboralmente con un nuevo estudio que le permita tener mejores aspiraciones laborales y ayudarles a sus padres en todos las necesidades de ellos; ya con el préstamo ayudara a su padres en la recolección de la cosecha de maíz.
texts.en:
Yanira is 41 years old. Thanks to her parents' efforts, they were able to give her an education, and due to her perseverance, she was able to study to university and earn a degree. Her parents live with her, and because they are now elderly, she stays with them to support them in every possible way.

Since she was very young, Yanira has been devoted to work, helping her parents in everything they need regarding agriculture. When she was in school, she worked in a store to support her studies, as she had to collaborate with her parents. 

After finishing school, she worked in a hospital and a school. Later, she stopped working and only worked seasonally, dedicating herself exclusively to her mother and father. She is very aware of them and works with them as necessary, taking care of her parents' animals (cattle).

The loan funds will be used to buy two oxen, which her father needs to harvest the corn crop. She said that her aspiration for the future is to excel, personally and vocationally, with a new education that will allow her to have better career aspirations and help her parents in all their needs. The loan will help her parents in the harvesting of the crop corn.

loans.use: to buy two oxen.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to build a new stable

loans.name: Jannat

texts.en:
Jannat, a 50-year-old mother of five, has been successfully running a small general store in her community for the last two years. With good communication skills and a good client list, she offers various goods for daily use. 

Motivated to provide for her family and consistently meet the increasing demand, Jannat has requested a loan of Rs 35,000 to buy stocks of rice, sugar and flour. Now in her third loan cycle with a good repayment history, she wishes to utilize some of her revenues to deal with personal expenses and to increase her business capital.

loans.use: to buy stocks of rice, sugar and flour.

loans.name: Esperanza Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Esperanza está en su ciclo número 22 del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas y cada una de estas mujeres está poniendo su mejor esfuerzo en cada ciclo por mejorar sus vidas y las de sus familias.
Una persona digna de destacar es la Sra. Gloria, quien se dedica a la peluquería, comenta que ya se pudo hacer de muy buena clientela, debido a que da muy buen servicio a todos sus clientes. Ella les hace a sus clientes todo tipo de confecciones y es así que se gana la vida. Su sueño es poder tener un taller amplio donde dar trabajo a otras personas que al igual que ella necesiten trabajar y salir adelante.
Pide este préstamo ya que quiere comprar telas, hilos, botones, gomas y demás insumos para seguir trabajando y cumpliendo con los pedidos de sus clientes, además de seguir mejorando sus ingresos.
texts.en:
The group called "Esperanza" (Hope) is in its 22nd loan cycle with the Women's Committee Program. All of the women have put forth their best effort in each of the loan cycles so that they can improve their lives and those of their families.

One decent individual worth mentioning is Sra. Gloria, who works as a hairdresser. She says that she was able to establish a good clientele because she provides good service to all of her customers. Gloria also makes all types of clothes for her customers in order to support herself. Her dream is to have a large workshop so that she can provide jobs to other people who also need to work and move forward.

Gloria is requesting a loan because she wants to buy fabrics, thread, buttons, elastic, and other supplies in order to keep working and fulfilling orders for her customers. In addition, she can keep improving her income.

loans.use: to buy fabrics, thread, buttons, elastic, and other supplies.

loans.name: Blanca Adriana

texts.es: Blanca Adriana madre soltera con 3 hijos menores de edad, originaria del municipio de Chinandega se dedica a la compra venta de mercadería en general como: cosméticos, ropa, zapatos, shampoo, cremas tratamientos, artículos para el hogar, también tiene una pequeña librería donde ofrece productos como: cuadernos, lápices de tinta y grafito, papel Bonds tamaño carta y legal, lápices de colores, pega, papelografo,  cartulinas entre otros,  uno de sus sueños es poder en un futuro no muy lejanos fortalecer su librería y vender otros servicios relacionados a este negocio, por lo que el objetivo de este crédito es para incrementar su inventario en ambos negocios, para asi aprovechar las ventas para este periodo de navidad que su demanda de clientes incrementan mas y asi lograr ofrecerles variedades de productos a sus clientes. Blanca Adriana esta muy contenta con los inversionistas kivas por el apoyo que ofrecen a personas de bajos recursos económicos.-
texts.en:
Blanca Adriana is a single mother with three minor children.  She is from the Cinandega municipality.  She buys and sells general merchandise like cosmetics, shoes, shampoo, treatment creams, and household items.  She also has a small bookstore where she sells products like notebooks, ink and graphite writing utensils, letter and legal sized bond paper, colored pencils, glue, flip chart sheets, and cardboard, among other things.

One of her dreams is to be able, in the near future, to strengthen her bookstore and sell other services related to this business.  Therefore, the objective of this loan is to increase her inventory in both businesses.  She will do this in order to take advantage of the sales during this Christmas season, which is when her customer demand increases.  This way she will manage to offer her customers a variety of products.

Blanca Adriana is very happy with the Kiva lenders for the support that they offer people with scarce economic resources.

loans.use: to buy general merchandise and office products.

loans.name: Ignacio

texts.es: Ignacio agradece a los inversionistas que le hayan apoyado con el crédito y se siente contento por el apoyo brindado y desea continuar participando en el proyecto, él continua con la agricultura pues él tiene varios terrenos de cultivos donde siembra y cosecha yuca, plátano, piña, arroz y continua con la crianza de animales menores como cuyes y gallinas, él sigue siendo un hombre emprendedor y trabajador  que saca adelante a su familia y continua siendo parte  del banco comunal “Paititi”, él en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar animales menores como cuyes y gallinas.
texts.en: Ignacio says that he is grateful for the support extended to him by lenders.  He is glad for the support and hopes to continue making the most of this project.  He has long worked the land, growing and harvesting yucca, plantanos, pineapples and rice.  He also raises farm animals--chickens and guinea pigs, for example--for sale.  He is an enterprising, hard-working man who has pulled his family ahead thanks in part to the support of the Paititi community bank.  Ignacio will use this loan to buy farm animals that he will raise and sell.

loans.use: to buy animals for his animal-sales business.

loans.name: Khursand

texts.ru: Хурсанд простой фермер с богатым внутренним миром. Она родилась в 1974 года. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 4 детей. Хурсанд вместе со своими детьми занимается выращиванием сельхоз культур, как помидор, картофель, лук и т.п. Она выращивает овощи на 0.35 га земли, который находится возле ее дома. Хурсанд продает свой урожай на местном рынке. Хурсанд упорно работает с раннего утра до позднего вечера. Основная забота семьи лежит на плечах Хурсанда, так как ее муж трудовой мигрант в Российской Федерации. Хурсанд должна провести свадебное торжество своего сына, но не имеет денег. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 5000 сомони для проведения свадебного торжества своего сына. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Khursand is a simple farmer with a rich inner world.  She was born in 1974, is married, and is raising four children.  Khursand and her children grow crops such as tomatoes, potatoes, onions, and so forth.  They raise the vegetables on 0.35 HA of land next to their home.  Khursand sells their harvests at the local market.  Khursand works tirelessly from early morning to late in the evening.  Her family's main cares rest on Khursand's shoulders, because her husband is an emigrant laborer working in Russia.

Khursand's son is getting married and she must throw the wedding party, but she doesn't have the money.  She is requesting a loan of 5,000 somoni (TJS) for her son's wedding party.  She is relying on your kindness.

loans.use: to throw a wedding party of her son

loans.name: Hawanatu

texts.en:
Meet Hawanatu. She is a 30-year-old from Jui eastern area in Freetown. She is married with two children. For the past 10 years, Hawanatu has established her cookery business. She began her business because she wanted to generate a permanent source of income. She works at the business from 8:00 a.m. until 7:00 p.m., seven days per week. She says that the main challenge to her business is insufficient capital to expand her business.

Hawanatu requires a loan in order to purchase more palm oil, rice and cooking seasonings to expand her business. She hopes that the extra income from this loan will allow her to change her status of living and increase her business. In the future, Hawanatu plans to open a big clothing shop. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to purchase more palm oil, rice and cooking seasonings to expand her business.

loans.name: Sento

texts.en:
Meet 33-year-old Sento from Jui, Sierra Leone. She is married with three children.  For the past 13 years, Sento has had a local food market. She began her business because she wanted to empower herself.  She works from 8:00 a.m. until 7:00 p.m., seven days per week. She is very hard-working and desires to improve her standard of living.

Sento requires a loan in order to purchase rice, sugar and milk to expand her business. She hopes that the extra income from this loan will allow her to start a savings account and increase her business. In the future, Sento plans to further expand her business. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to purchase rice, sugar and milk to expand her business.

loans.name: Julio Wilmer

texts.es:
Julio, está acompañado, vive con su compañera de su vida y tiene dos hijos de 11 y 8 años, todos dependen económicamente de él, de su padre aprendió la siembra de maíz y frijoles, es una actividad que desempeña desde las 6:00 a.m. hasta las 2:00 p.m., es un  negocio que le ha dado ningún problema.
Con la inversión comprara fertilizantes, plaguicidas, abono y semilla, para que el terreno donde sembrara esté debidamente preparado, espera aumentar la producción, tener mejores ganancias, y diversificar más la siembra.
Su prioridad es que sus hijos sean profesionales, para que tengan mayores oportunidades de desarrollo, tener un negocio más amplio y una economía mejorada.
texts.en:
Julio is in a relationship with his life companion. He has two children (ages 11 and 8) who are completely dependent on him. Julio learned how to plant corn and beans from his father. He works at his job from 6:00 A.M. to 2:00 P.M. His business has not given him any problems.

With this investment, Julio will buy fertilizers, fungicides, compost, and seeds so that he can properly prepare the land for planting. He hopes to increase production, generate more income, and diversify his crops.

His priority is to see his children become professionals so that they will have more opportunities for development. He also wants to have a larger business and improved finances.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, fungicides, compost, and seeds.

loans.name: Marian

texts.es:
Marian es de la ciudad de Coronel Oviedo, está estudiando la carrera de enfermería, está en su tercer año, y comenta que estudio esta carrera para salir adelante y poder crecer.
Comenta que le gusta poder ayudar  a las personas, y que su mayor sueño es poder hacer un postgrado en hemodiálisis.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en el pago de las cuotas, ya que podrá cubrir ese gasto. Agradece por la oportunidad que esta recibiendo de poder seguir estudiando.
texts.en:
Marian is from the city of Coronel Oviedo and is a nursing student.  She is in her third year and says that she chose this career so that she could grow and get ahead.

She also says that she wants to help people and her greatest dream is to do postgraduate work in hemodialysis.

She is asking for this loan so that she can pay tuition and is grateful for the opportunity to continue studying.

loans.use: to pay tuition.

loans.name: Lesly Yasmina

texts.es:
La señora  Lesly  Yasmina  de 35   años de edad, vive con su esposo,   tiene  02 hijos que dependen de ella, vive en casa de familiar,  en una  comunidad  de San Lorenzo, valle al sur de Honduras.
Doña Lesly se dedica desde hace 04  años  al negocio de la venta de helados de todos sabores y presentaciones, compra al por mayor y salen todo los días a vender el producto.
Doña Lesly está solicitando el préstamo para compra de helados, cemento, ladrillos, estos últimos por que quiere realizarle unas mejoras a su casa pagar mano de obra para avanzar la construcción de su casa,  pero espera que  con el apoyo de Prisma a su inversión la terminara de construir.


San Lorenzo, Honduras - Octubre del 2013.
texts.en:
Sra. Lesly Yasmina, 35, lives with her husband and two young children.  They live in a house they own in San Lorenzo, a town in southern Honduras. 
Doña Lesly has operated an ice-cream-sales business for 4 years.  She buys wholesale supplies of ice cream, of all kinds and flavors, and goes out every day to sell it.
Doña Lesly is applying for a loan, part of which she will use to buy ice cream and the rest to pay for the labor and supplies she needs to make improvements to her house.  She expects the loan will allow her to complete the work.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - Octubre del 2013.

loans.use: to both stock her business and pay for improvements to her house.

loans.name: Margret

texts.en:
Margret is 18 years old and lives in the town of Tororo in the Mbale region of Uganda. She is married and has two children, with one of them currently in school. For the past three years, Margret has been working hard to manage her fish business, which sells small silver fish.

To help expand her business, Margret has requested a loan of 300,000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to buy more small silver fish and big smoked fish to sell, and will help Margret to generate greater profits and take care of her children. Margret hopes that in the future she will be able to buy a cow.

Margret is a member of BRAC's Empowerment and Livelihood for Adolescents (ELA) program. In addition to microfinance loans, the program provides both a safe place for young Ugandan women to take part in group activities and a forum for life-skills training.





"

loans.use: to buy more small silver fish and big smoked fish to sell,

loans.name: Lillian

texts.en:
Lillian is 20 years old and lives in the town of Tororo in the Mbale region of Uganda. She has no children. For the past four years, Lillian has been working hard to manage her produce business, which sells maize flour, beans and rice. 

To help expand her business, Lillian has requested a loan of 600,000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to purchase more produce, and will help Lillian to generate greater profits and take care of her parents. Lillian hopes that in the future, she will be able to construct rental houses. 

Lillian is a member of BRAC's Empowerment and Livelihood for Adolescents (ELA) program. In addition to microfinance loans, the program provides both a safe place for young Ugandan women to take part in group activities, and a forum for life-skills training.

loans.use: to purchase more produce.

loans.name: Señor De Huanca Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “SEÑOR DE HUANCA”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.                                                                                                                                                                                             
El socio es José Antonio, el tiene 50 años de edad es conviviente y tiene 05 hijos, el socio altera sus actividades diarias trabajando en una  empresa privada, el socio trabaja seis días a la semana y un día libre, él socio lleva trabajando buen tiempo el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su trabajo, el socio es una persona responsable y empeñoso siendo de esta manera que el socio desea poder seguir trabajando para continuar apoyando a su familia.
El socio solicita el crédito para la compra de víveres para su hogar como azucar, leche, arroz entre otros.
Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de helados, venta de ropa, sastrería, restaurante.
El socio que sale en la foto adjunta pidió permiso para llegar tarde a la reunión por motivos de trabajo.
El socio agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete  a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The members belong to the “Señor de Huanca” communal bank, this bank is located in the district of Cusco, which belongs to the province and department of Cusco. 

The member in question is José Antonio, he is 50 years old, has a live-in partner and has 5 children. José Antonio alternates his daily activities working in a private company. He works six days a week and has a day off. He has been working for a long time and it is going well thanks to the effort that he puts into his work every day. José Antonio is a responsible and persevering person and it is in this manner that he hopes to continue working in order to carry on supporting his family. José Antonio is seeking the loan to buy supplies for his household such as sugar, milk, rice and so on. 

The other members make their living selling ice-cream, clothes, in tailoring, and restaurants. The member appearing in the smaller photo sought permission to attend the meeting later because of work. José Antonio is grateful to those who are forming part of this dream via this scheme, and he pledges to meet the repayment within the set time frame.

loans.use: to buy supplies for her home such as sugar, milk, rice and so on.

loans.name: Bahodur

texts.ru:
Баходуру 37 лет. Он женатый мужчина. Его жена работает медсестрой. Они воспитывают четверых детей. У них трое сына и одна дочка. Их дети учатся в школе. Баходур особое внимание обращает воспитанию, здоровью и образованию детей.
   Баходур является дехканином. Около 3 лет занимается растениеводством. Опыт работы и навыки в этой сфере он получил от отца. Многие жители района Яван и других районов, сел и деревень заняты сельским хозяйством. Баходур наравне с соседями и односельчанами спешно занимается посевом урожая, чтобы весной получить урожай. Для посева урожая Баходуру необходимы средства, на которые он купит минеральные удобрения, горючей смеси и семян. Для приобретения этих продуктов он просит кредит.
texts.en:
Bahodur is 37 years old and married.  His wife is a nurse, and they are raising four children.  They have three sons and a daughter, all of whom are in school.  Bahodur is very attentive to his children's upbringing, health, and education.  

Bahodur is a farmer.  For about three years he has been in this type of business.  He got all his know-how and experience working for his father.  Many residents of the Yavan and other regions, towns, and villages work in farming.  Bahodur, like his neighbors and the others in his village, is hurring to sow his crops so that he'll have a spring harvest.  For sowing, Bahodur needs the funds with which to buy mineral fertilizers, fuel, and seed.  He is requesting a loan to buy these things.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizers, fuel, and seed

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en:
Mohammad is a 26-year-old single young man from a small village near Tulkarem called Attel. He lives with his family in an old house in the village. Mohammad owns a mini-market in the village. It has been open for two years. It is a good business and earns a good income. Mohammad would like to improve his business but he does not have enough liquidity.

Mohammad took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy more basic products for his mini-market to resell. By taking this loan, Mohammad will be able to develop his business and buy all the needed stock. Mohammad appears in the photo while he was working

loans.use: to develop his business and buy all the needed stock to resell in his mini-market

loans.name: San Lorenzo Group

texts.es:
El comité San Lorenzo está conformado por mujeres luchadoras que trabajan día a día para poder tener sus propios ingresos., y por medio de eso poder ayudar a sus familias. Son mujeres muy sacrificadas y emprendedoras.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Epifania, que se dedica exclusivamente a la cría de animales, ella comenta que con sus  50 años de edad y con la lucha constante del día a día también se dedica a los cultivos de frutas y verduras  consciente de que este trabajo y esfuerzo que está haciendo debe ser  constante para lograr el progreso que anhela alcanzar.
La Sra. Epifania solicita de este crédito para la compra de  balanceados para sus animales, y de esa forma poder invertir en su actividad, lo que le ayudará  a concretar su plan de negocio, y a mejorar sus ingresos. En la foto del grupo aparecen 16 personas, ya que esa es la cantidad de integrantes de este grupo, pero esta vez solo 14 retiran de este crédito.
texts.en:
The San Lorenzo Committee is made up of hardworking women who work daily to be able to have their own businesses and help their families.  They are entrepreneurial woman who make many sacrifices.

Epifania is one of the members and raises animals.  She says that at age 50, and with her daily work she also raises fruits and vegetables, knowing that this work and effort must be constant so that she can make the progress that she is striving for.

Epifania is asking for this loan to buy balanced feed for her animals.  This will help her to solidify her business plans and improve her income.  There are 16 persons in the photograph, but only 14 of them will receive part of this loan.

loans.use: to buy feed.

loans.name: Elsuida

texts.en: Elsuida is a young married mother of a six-month-old child who lives in northern Albania and has run her own livestock business for the past three years.  “As soon as we married, we both decided to go into the livestock. We had and knew nothing else to do, but just do what majority of people in the village do. This though, has been the source of income for our little family. We started it small and we will see as we go, yet for sure we will try to expand it in the future. For now all I want is to expand the existing stable, because animals have no enough room to stretch their legs while asleep,” said Elsuida.

loans.use: to expand the existing stable.

loans.name: Kendra Nerisa

texts.es:
Kendra es una joven emprendedora de 23 años de edad, soltera y sin hijos, actualmente pasante universitaria de la carrera Administración de Empresas. Ella vive con sus padres los cuales la apoyan y la motivan en todo lo posible siendo ellos quienes le enseñaran la actividad, estrategias, contactos y demás que hacen de un negocio exitoso ya que ellos también son comerciantes. Kendra tiene una tienda de venta de variedades de moda desde zapato cerrado, sandalia, botas hasta la rodilla, pendientes, pulseras, relojes, etc. dirigido al sexo femenino de todas las edades dedicándose a esta actividad por más de 5 años. Sus metas a corto plazo son comprar mercadería para la temporada navideña la cual es muy provechosa. Su sueño es formar una cadena de tiendas en diferentes partes del país y hacer de su tienda un éxito con el cual pueda asegurar los ingresos para sus estudios y en un futuro para sus hijos y su familia.
Por lo que hoy en día ella solicita financiamiento para la compra de mercadería como ser: 20 pares de zapatos de tacón alto, 35 pares de sandalia, 15 unidades de cartera para dama, 10 (unidades) monederos de mano, 50 unidades accesorios de toda variedad, 10 lociones y 6 pares de botas altas para mujer. Por lo que ella espera se le apoye y pueda cumplir las metas propuestas para esta temporada y principalmente sus sueños.
texts.en:
Kendra, 23, is a young entrepreneur.  She's single and has no children, and is currently an intern in business administration.  She lives with her parents, who support her and motivate her all they can: they're also merchants and they taught her the job, strategies, contacts, and everything that makes a successful business.

Kendra has a store where she sells a variety of clothing for women of all ages: shoes, sandals, ankle boots, necklaces, bracelets, watches, and so forth.  She has had this business for more than five years.

Her short-term goal is to buy merchandise for the Christmas season, which is very profitable.  Her dream is to create a chain of stores throughout the country and make her store a success.  This way she'll be able to secure the income to pay for her studies and, in the future, her children and her family.

For this reason Kendra's requesting financing to buy merchandise: 20 pairs of high-heeled shoes, 35 pairs of sandals, 15 women's wallets, 10 change purses, 50 accessories of various types, 10 containers of lotion, and 6 pairs of high boots for women.  She hopes for support so she can realize her seasonal goals and her dreams.

loans.use: to buy women's shoes

loans.name: Marie

texts.en:
Maria wants to buy a dairy cow. Maria, who lives in the northern part of the country, is a 52-year-old married mother of six children; one of them has been suffering from a disease since birth. 

“I have to look after my daughter almost all the time; two other kids passed away also due to the same disease. The livestock activity, I have been carrying it out since 1993. That has been the only source of income for all of us. At times, I feel drained from doing so much, but thank God my other kids and husband help me out,” said Maria.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow

loans.name: Alejandro

texts.es:
Alejandro tiene 45 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa en la zona rural de Cayalti, su población se dedica al cultivo de caña, arroz, comercio y ganadería a dos horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, costa norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la actividad de siembra y venta de alfalfa y chala, que lo distribuye a los caseríos aledaños a su comunidad, ha solicitado un préstamo de 4 000 nuevos soles para comprar una mototaxi nueva, la que tenía tiene 10 años de antigüedad y es muy costoso repararla, lo que le permitirá seguir trabajando y generando ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Alejandro is 45 years old and lives with his wife in the rural district of Cayalti. His town is known for the cultivation of sugar cane and rice, trade, and livestock breeding. This community is two hours away from the city of Chiclayo, which is on the northern coast of Peru.

Alejandro grows and sells alfalfa and corn husks, which he delivers to the neighboring villages in his community. He is requesting a loan of 4,000 PEN so that he can buy a new motorcycle taxi. The one he has is 10 years old and in need of costly repairs. This will enable him to continue working and generating income for his family.

loans.use: to buy a new motorcycle taxi for delivering his crops.

loans.name: Ramon Antonio

texts.es: Ramón, un señor de 56 años de edad, es originario de la ciudad de Estelí. Es casado y padre de 8 hijos. Su oficio es de comerciante, se dedica a la venta de repuestos de bicicletas.  Hace 14 años, inicio un pequeño negocio con poco dinero, Reparando y vendiendo repuestos de bicicletas, poco a poco fue creciendo su negocio hasta lo que tiene hoy con un inventario que lo hace orgulloso del único negocio que ha tenido en su vida. Su meta próxima es incrementar sus ventas a través del surtido de su taller así ofreciendo a sus clientes un gama de productos más variado. Solicita el crédito para comprar repuestos de bicicletas como: rines, rayos, llantas, manecillas, entre otros con el fin de cumplir con la demanda de sus clientelas.  Estima que el crédito le ayudará hacer su negocio más surtido así que sus clientes sean leales porque sabrán que el servicio es bueno. Su plan futuro es mejorar su vivienda y establecer otra sucursal en otro municipio.
texts.en: Ramon, 56, is from the city of Esteli.  He is married and the father of 8 children.  He started a bicycle parts business 14 years ago, using a little money he had for a shop where he repaired bicycles and sold bicycle parts.  The business, the only one that he has ever owned, has slowly grown over the years and now has an inventory that anyone would be proud of.  Ramon wants to grow the business further and broaden the range of products that he sells.  He is applying for a loan that he will use to buy the parts--rims, spokes, tires, etc.--that his customers most want.  He believes the loan will help him to fully stock his business and, in turn, ensure that his customers keep coming to him for what they need.  For the future, he wants to improve his house and open a branch of his business in another town.

loans.use: to stock his bicycle parts business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to stock his furniture sales business.

loans.name: Martín De Jesús

texts.es:
Martín de 50 años de edad,  debido a las condiciones económicas de su familia apenas pudo cursar un 6º grado, su esposa es maestra y sus hijos ya no están con él, ya son adultos y casados, vive una nieta con él  y su esposa.

 Luego dejar  de estudiar y se dedico a trabajar con su padre en la agricultura. Al pasar los años trabajo en caminos como colaborador arreglando las calles, trabajo mas de 15 años en estos lugares, luego trabajo 2 años como ayudante de albañil con un pariente; quien le enseño lo básico para esta actividad. Después,  tomo la decición de trabajar por su cuenta tomando trabajos pequeños a medida pasaban los años fue adquiriendo mas experiencia y mas clientes, esto fue hace 30 años, en este transcurso de tiempo pudo con mucho esfuerzo comprar un pequeño terreno, trabajando de día construyendo una casa por encargo y por las noches construyendo su casa  y con mucho esfuerzo termino su vivienda. Los trabajos para que lo buscan en lugares cercanos de su casa y trabaja todo el día hasta por la tarde, 


Los fondos del crédito serán utilizados, para la compra de herramientas para uso exclusivo de la construcción. Él manifestó que espera para un futuro terminar su casa, ya que le hacen falta terminarle de construir la casa de su madre, ya que debido al tiempo no se la podido terminar.
texts.en:
Martin is 50 years old and, due to his family's financial situation, he only finished up to sixth grade at school.  Martin's wife is a teacher.  Their children no longer live at home - they are grown-up and married.  One of their grandchildren lives with Martin and his wife.

After leaving school, Martin started working in farming with his father.  Later on, he spent 15 years working as a road worker, helping to fix the roads.  Later still Martin spent two years as a builder, working with a relative who taught Martin the basics of this work.  With this experience, Martin decided to start taking on small jobs independently.  As the years passed, he gained more experience and more customers.  This was now 30 years ago and, as time has gone by, with a lot of effort Martin has been able to buy a small plot of land.  During the days he worked on other people's houses and at night he built his own.  With a lot of hard work, Martin will finish building his house.  People now come looking for Martin to do work in nearby places.  He works all day long.

This loan will be used to buy tools for building work.  Martin tells us that he hopes to finish his house in the future as he still has to finish building his mother's house.  Due to time constraints he has not been able to do this yet.

loans.use: to buy tools for building work.

loans.name: Xiomara Del Socorro

texts.es: Doña Xiomara es originaria de la ciudad de Granada, tiene 44 años de edad. Casada y madre de tres hijos. Es de oficio comerciante, se dedica a la venta de verduras. Inicio este negocio vendiendo plátanos, luego con las ganancias obtenidas fue comprando diversidad de verduras. Hoy en día cuenta con un negocio grande donde oferta todo tipo de verduras. Su meta próxima es seguir aumentando su negocio y poder ofrecerles a sus clientes un surtido de productos. Solicita el crédito para comprar: papas, plátanos, ayote, pipián entre otros, con el fin de incrementar la clientela. Estima que el crédito le será de ayuda ya que aumentara las ventas y obtendrá mejores ganancias. Su plan futuro es mejorar su negocio e incrementando el nivel de verduras.
texts.en:
Xiomara is from the city of Granada and is 44 years old. She is married and the mother of three children. A vendor by trade, she sells vegetables. She started this business selling plantains, and later, with the profits she obtained, began to buy a variety of vegetables. Now she has a large business where she offers every kind of vegetable. 

Her immediate goal is to continue increasing her business to be able to offer her clients a variety of products. She is requesting the loan to buy potatoes, plantains, squash and other items, with the aim of increasing her clientele. She considers that the loan will be a help to her, as she will increase her sales and obtain better earnings. Her future plan is to improve her business by increasing her supply of vegetables.

loans.use: To buy potatoes, plantains, squash and other items.

loans.name: Martin

texts.en:
Martin is a 28-year-old single man who divorced his wife due to family problems. He has four children. He deals in goat rearing and trade as his source of income, which he has been doing for five years. He applied for a loan of 800,000 Ugandan shillings to help him buy more goats for trade. 

He hopes to construct a good house for his children and also take them to good schools.

loans.use: To buy more goats for selling.

loans.name: Marie

texts.en:
Marie is a 45-year-old villager from the northern part of Albania who wants to build a stable with this loan; the existing stable, as you can see in the photograph, is in bad shape. 

“The winter is starting soon and I am very worried about my animals. I don’t want them to sleep in the cold; our region is very cold as we are close to the Alps,” said Marie. 

Marie is married and has three children, with two of them still attending school. Her husband suffered a car accident not long ago, and she has been looking after him as well. “My husband is not capable of helping in any way now, and I’ve got to do everything by myself and this makes it tougher,” continued Marie.

Livestock has been the activity that she has pursued these past 13 years.

loans.use: to build a stable.

loans.name: Dava

texts.en:
Dava wants to buy four dairy sheep. This will be her third loan, with the previous ones being paid off. 
Dava is married and has three children; she is forty-seven-years-old.  About seven years ago, she started to expand her herd.  With the animals she had at that moment, she only supplied her family with its dairy needs, yet, she wanted to earn an income of it. She has studied at the public university; however, finding a job in her profession was like "finding the hay in the needle stack," according to her. Thus, it made sense to her to pursue livestock.
“I don’t regret my decision, because I was fully aware that there would be no opportunities available in my profession…I make my income through this activity, and this is what matters in the end,” said Dava.

loans.use: to buy four dairy sheep.

loans.name: Paulina

texts.es: Paulina nació en la ciudad de Accha pero actualmente vive en la ciudad de Pilcopata. (La ciudad de Pilcopata está ubicada en el distrito del Kosñipata dentro de la provincia de Paucartambo en el departamento de Cusco, Perú).
